00139 template <class T> 
00140 inline T dzdbobject_cast(DzDBObjectBase *item)
00141 {
00142     return int(static_cast<T>(0)->Type) == int(DzDBObjectBase::Type)
00143     || (item && int(static_cast<T>(0)->Type) == item->type()) ? static_cast<T>(item) : 0;
00144 }
00145 
00146 template <class T> 
00147 inline T dzdbobject_cast(const DzDBObjectBase *item)
00148 {
00149     return int(static_cast<T>(0)->Type) == int(DzDBObjectBase::Type)
00150     || (item && int(static_cast<T>(0)->Type) == item->type()) ? static_cast<T>(item) : 0;
00151 }
00152 
00153 template <class T> 
00154 inline T* dzdbobject_cast(DzDBObjectBasePtr& item)
00155 {
00156     return dzdbobject_cast<T*>( item.operator->() );
00157 }
00158 
00159 template <class T> 
00160 inline T* dzdbobject_cast(const DzDBObjectBasePtr& item)
00161 {
00162     return dzdbobject_cast<T*>( item.operator->() );
00163 }

00165 #define DB_SCRIPT_OBJECT_DECLARE( class, typeValue )\
00166     enum { Type = typeValue };\
00167     int type() const { return typeValue; }\
00168     virtual QString className() const { static const QString cName(#class); return cName; }\
00169     virtual QString getTableName()const{ static const QString tName(DzDBObjectBase::getTableName()); return tName; }\
00170     virtual QScriptValue toScriptValue( QScriptEngine *engine ){ return engine->toScriptValue(this); }
00171 
00172 #define DB_OBJECT_DECLARE( class, typeValue )\
00173     enum { Type = typeValue };\
00174     int type() const { return typeValue; }\
00175     virtual QString className() const { static const QString cName(#class); return cName; }\
00176     virtual QString getTableName()const{ static const QString tName(DzDBObjectBase::getTableName()); return tName; }\
00177     virtual QScriptValue toScriptValue( QScriptEngine *engine ){ return engine->nullValue(); }
00178 
00179 #define DB_OBJECT_DECLARE_PROPERTY( type , name )\
00180     struct fld##name;\
00181     type get##name() const;\
00182     void set##name(const type& val);
00183 
00184 #define DB_OBJECT_DECLARE_PTR_PROPERTY( type , name )\
00185     struct fld##name;\
00186     type* get##name() const;\
00187     void set##name(type *val);
